name: Play it again Sam 13
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Barbarian II: The Dungeon of Drax a single player action fighting game. It was developed by Peter Scott and was originally released in 1989 by Superior/Acornsoft. Hyperball a single player Arkanoid/Breakout style game. It was developed by Steve Parkinson and was first published in this compilation. Pandemonium a single player arcade adventure. It was developed by Peter Scott and was originally released in 1986 by Top Ten as part of their Peter Scott Trilogy. Percy Penguin a single player maze puzzler. It was developed by John Llewellyn and was originally released in 1984 by Superior Software.
